name: Coconut Macaroons
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Beat the egg whites until fluffy. Stir in sugar, salt and vanilla. Blend in the coconut. Drop by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased wrapping paper on baking sheet. Bake until set and deli- cately browned. They spread during baking, so when they come from oven, shape into mounds by gathering in edges with fingers. Bake at 325Â° for 15 to 18 minutes.
